did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, articles, manuscripts, manuals, photographs, film reels, reports, educational materials, notes, theses.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
did.abstract: Materials concerning the American Institutes for Research, education norms, vocational education, educational psychology and Dunn's career in the Education Department at Cornell University.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, articles, manuals, guides, course material, photographs and movies concerning the American Institutes for Research, education norms, vocational education, educational psychology and Dunn's career in the Education Department at Cornell University.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: James Dunn papers, #27-2-3170. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

emph.ref: Series I. American Institutes for Research (AIR), 1968-1977)
